translate.english: fall ill / be ill / become ill

examples.example: 希望每个人都能保持健康，尽量不生病，快乐地生活每一天。

translate.english: Hope everyone can keep healthy, try not to get sick as much as possible, and live happily every day.

examples.example: 我的朋友最近生病了，但他依然保持着乐观的心态积极面对。

translate.english: My friend has been ill recently, but he still maintains an optimistic attitude and faces it actively.

examples.example: 邻居张大爷生病了，大家都主动去帮忙照顾他。

translate.english: Neighbor Grandpa Zhang is ill, and everyone takes the initiative to help take care of him.
